trans-unit.source: Provides data for the <xref uid="langword_csharp_AudioLevelUpdated" name="AudioLevelUpdated" href=""></xref> event of the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer"></xref> or the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Fornisce dati per il <xref uid="langword_csharp_AudioLevelUpdated" name="AudioLevelUpdated" href=""> </xref> evento del <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer"> </xref> o <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: When they are raised, the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.AudioLevelUpdated?displayProperty=fullName> and <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.AudioLevelUpdated?displayProperty=fullName> events pass an instance of AudioLevelUpdatedEventArgs to the handler for the associated event.
trans-unit.target: Quando vengono generati, il <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.AudioLevelUpdated?displayProperty=fullName>e <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.AudioLevelUpdated?displayProperty=fullName>eventi passano un'istanza di AudioLevelUpdatedEventArgs al gestore per l'evento associato.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.AudioLevelUpdated?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.AudioLevelUpdated?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.AudioLevelUpdatedEventArgs.AudioLevel%2A> property gets the new level of audio input when the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.AudioLevelUpdated?displayProperty=fullName> or <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.AudioLevelUpdated?displayProperty=fullName> event is raised.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.AudioLevelUpdatedEventArgs.AudioLevel%2A>proprietà ottiene il nuovo livello di audio di input quando il <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.AudioLevelUpdated?displayProperty=fullName>o <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.AudioLevelUpdated?displayProperty=fullName>viene generato l'evento.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.AudioLevelUpdated?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.AudioLevelUpdated?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.AudioLevelUpdatedEventArgs.AudioLevel%2A>

trans-unit.source: The `AudioLevel` property of the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer> and <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine> classes provides the current level of the audio input to the speech recognition engine.
trans-unit.target: Il `AudioLevel` proprietà del <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer>e <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine>classi fornisce il livello corrente dell'input audio per il motore di riconoscimento vocale.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer>

trans-unit.source: Gets the new level of audio input after the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.AudioLevelUpdated"></xref> or the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.AudioLevelUpdated"></xref> event is raised.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene il nuovo livello di input audio dopo il <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.AudioLevelUpdated"> </xref> o <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.AudioLevelUpdated"> </xref> viene generato l'evento.

trans-unit.source: The new level of audio input.
